data.message: bitch stop playing around and drop some songs -_- I've got sick of reading your posts and the damn comments too -_-

replies.message:
Oh and it's spelt some not sum.

Dumbass
hahahahhaha yeah and the bitch just replied to my comment
Ouch that must have taken sometime to compose lol
he just keep posting comercials -_- what the hell happend to him ?? we need new album ! a solo album !!!!!

He's released 2 albums in last 2 yrs 
MMLP2 and shady xv
Owned on your own comment salah lmfao
:3 I know :/ but it's not enough :/ I mean I'm good with the last albums but please !! he's Eminem he can drop an album or a song whenever he likes to :3

Salah do you know how much money and time it takes to do a album let the man spend some time with his family if it was next year summer and still nothing then I'll feel ur pain but come on you gotta wait

Lol he just dropped an album like 6 months ago, apparently U haven't appreciated the songs in shady xv, I listened to it 3 times and now I can't get his new songs out of my head, insane- was beautifully done, vegas- was hilariously done Detroit vs everybody- was gangsterly done and everything else was amazing! The first time I listened to it I couldn't get hooked but U gotta take time to appreciate what a lot of his songs mean and what they R
